title: Can this video card play League of Legends with good fps and graphics quality?
body:
Hi I am buying a new computer, the specs are: 
Acer Aspire AT3-710-EB51 Desktop 
- Intel Core i7-6700 3.4GHz, 12GB DDR3, 2TB HDD 
- NVIDIA GTX 745 4GB Graphics 
- Windows 10 Home 64-bit.

I am wondering if these specs and if the NVIDIA GTX 745 4GB Graphics video card can play LOL with pretty high FPS and good graphics quality.
If anyone can help me that would be great!

replies.body: Upgrade the card imo. Unless League is all you care about.

I have some generic i5 processor and an R7 370 which is one there opening cards by AMD it cost $100 and it runs league of max settings at 60 fps never dips below.  I also have 35 /mbts down internet and i rarely go over 44 ms.  They only time it does its if i got netflix running on my second screen which brings my ms to 60-70 ms.

I don't work closely with specs or graphics cards, so couldn't make any guarantees for performance.  What I can suggest is bookmarking our [recommended specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide, which can help you make the best decision for you.  Hope it helps!

Ok, thank you very much for your help!

hollywood41
It will run league at 1080 with above 60 fps.
